mapper.select:
select * from t_jyzfmx where 1 = 1
order by ${orderBy}

select * from t_jyzfmx where 1=1
order by ${params.orderBy}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_jyzfmx (ddh, sqlsh, zffs_dm, zfje, gsdm, lrsj, lrry, xgsj, xgry, paynumber) values
(#{item.ddh},#{item.sqlsh},#{item.zffsDm},#{item.zfje},#{item.gsdm},#{item.lrsj}, #{item.lrry},#{item.xgsj},#{item.xgry},#{item.paynumber})
